English: what kind of a (person, apartment, day)
(act) in accordance (with the schedule, the law)
(president, government, address) at / of the time
a different kind of (picture, situation, role)
(progress, situation) to date, up to now
complicit (in a crime, in a murder)
perky, alert, upbeat (child, old person, feeling)
for the most (part), majority (of the votes)
(the man is) famous (for his strength, skills)
last (summer, year), the day before yesterday
in good shape / condition (runner, car, road)
(a problem, situation, product) of the same type
(a man, partner, entrepreneur) in their fifties

Finnish: kansalainen (this is a noun, not an adjective)

English: (a church, man, dish) from St. Petersburg
